member.name: ASF_FLAT_PICTURE
member.summary: Contains an image that is stored as metadata for a media source. This structure is used as the data item for the WM/Picture metadata attribute.

member.name: ASF_FLAT_PICTURE.bPictureType
member.summary: Specifies the type of image. This member is equivalent to the bPictureType member in the WM_PICTURE structure.

member.name: ASF_FLAT_PICTURE.dwDataLen
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the image data.
